allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add expanded Services mega menu with 5 grouped categories and inner pages

Restructure the Services navigation mega menu into 5 sections:
Application Services, Data & Analytics, AI, Infrastructure, and
Training & Capacity Development. Each section shows representative
items with "..view more" links to dedicated inner pages. Add new
data files, index pages, and detail pages for AI, Infrastructure,
and Training service categories with full routing support.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
